report.title: Group counts using standard parameters
report.description: Gives the count of species groups recorded at an event.
report.query: (SELECT taxon_group, count(*) as count FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# GROUP BY taxon_group ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT #top_n_groups_to_include#) UNION SELECT 'Others', sum(count) FROM ( SELECT taxon_group, count(*) FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# GROUP BY taxon_group ORDER BY count(*) DESC OFFSET #top_n_groups_to_include# ) as sub ORDER BY taxon_group
